entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
